biotools.summary: SPUMONI is a fast read classification tool for targeted nanopore sequencing. It uses a compressed r-index together with a streaming matching-statistics algorithm and statsitical test to classify reads.

bioschemas.name: SPUMONI
bioschemas.summary: SPUMONI is a fast read classification tool for targeted nanopore sequencing. It uses a compressed r-index together with a streaming matching-statistics algorithm and statsitical test to classify reads.
